body:
NDKDemo illustrates use of the [Android Native Developers Kit](http://developer.android.com/tools/sdk/ndk/index.html)

The associated blog post is available on [my blog](http://guycole.blogspot.com/2012/03/yet-another-android-ndk-blog-posting.html)
name: NativeDemo
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
